name: hopping madhouse
description:
We don't want Big Brother watching! Hopping madhouse is a  5 minute first person game in which you throw your hacky sacks to break the Big Brother cameras that keep falling from the ceiling. It becomes an increasingly chaotic 'hopping madhouse' as you progress. Break as many as you can to see your rank at the end of the game. Will you become the first Jedi?

No ads. No in game purchases.

W-A-S-D to move, mouse to look around, and Left mouse button to throw hacky sacks. The game captures your mouse, use the Escape key to release your mouse and use it outside of the game window. 

A game made in Unity by ShivaFooL, a solo developer in New Mexico.
